name: Ales
description:
- Game Description - 

Sit down, relax and fly a kite in the peaceful surroundings of nature. Watch as the birds fly past, listen to the chill music playing in the background and your kite glide around in front of you in this short little VR experience.

- Story Behind -

This was a four week project for Uni with the focus of creating a mindful, relaxing experience for the player. The team was made up of two Game Designers Kell Macartney and Jesse Linards and one programmer Jay Faulkner. This is our first time using/ creating for VR so please be gentle.

We hope that you enjoy the experience created for you and that you feel more relaxed and mindful once everything has concluded.

~ Note ~ 

The Windows build was only tested on  the Oculus Rift, it's possible it will work on other VR hardware.   The Oculus go build can only be installed through side-loading. Instructions on this can be found here. if you need more help with that, feel free to contact Jay on twitter.
